title: The Great Camel Race
creator_credit: Orana Films, ABC-TV (Australia), Richard Dennison and Bill Leimbach
brief_description: The Great Camel Race, the longest animal endurance ever - from Alice Springs to the Gold Coast - is a rare example of the outback documentary that has a real story to tell. A story in which we can cheer the heroes and choose our villains!
creator_credit_for_label: Orana Films, ABC-TV (Australia), Richard Dennison and Bill Leimbach
